name: LetoileSystemsPvtLtd
0:
”Alexa, turn on Light”
”Alexa, set the fan speed to 5”
”Alexa, turn on AC”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Letoile Designer Home Automation can control your existing light, AC, Fan, Chandelier, etc using touch, remote, mobile, internet & voice(Alexa). For enabling Alexa skill, you need the Letoile Home Automation panel, Letoile Home Server & Alexa device, or mobile app. 
Use your amazon account to login to this Alexa skill.
